ModMetaData.name: Kaiser Armory
ModMetaData.author: ALIEN
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is adding to your game various weapons used by Germans during WW1, all with custom tech tree and sounds. Everything can be crafted on "Kaiser machining table", which you can build after researching "Basic german weapons".
Weapons included : Gew 98, Gew 98 with bayonet, M1916 Selbstlader, MP 18, WEX flamethrower, C96, P08, P08 Altillerie, MG 15 n.A., M1887 Feldspate, S98/05 bayonet, M1873 Säbel and M1915 Stielhandgranate. Defensive structures : MG 08 heavy machine gun, 7,7cm FK 96 n.A. field gun and 10,5cm leFH 16 howitzer.
This mod is supposed to be historically accurate so keep this in mind while suggesting anything. If you like what i made it here remember to rate it, thank you :)
